actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to facilitate in a realistic manner the implementation by States of child day care services programs under title XX of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Authorizes each State to determine the staffing standards with respect to child day care services for which the State receives payments under Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to facilitate in a realistic manner the implementation by States of child day care services programs under title XX of the Social Security Act.
